title: DONT CHANGE THE ROSE ICON
body: Please Riot, do not change the rose icon, I have used it since day one and this icon means more to me than you think, I will never look at league of Legends the same again if you change it. So again I beg, KEEP THE OLD ICONS. so please vote on the poll {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I must have missed the memo, they're changing icons?

> [{quoted}](name=Ginnjii,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PjfFE7Vp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-20T19:44:02.397+0000)
>
> I must have missed the memo, they're changing icons?

???

> [{quoted}](name=Ginnjii,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PjfFE7Vp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-20T19:44:02.397+0000)
>
> I must have missed the memo, they're changing icons?

yea they're updating a few icons

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/1216-pbe-update.html

The old icons look so bad though. The new ones look amazing.

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Lr7N6pbF07A/VJDEFMW_3LI/AAAAAAAAgH4/-uRLOAWIQnQ/s1600/rose%2Bdifference.jpg

How could you NOT like that?!

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PjfFE7Vp,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-20T21:11:38.918+0000)
>
> The old icons look so bad though. The new ones look amazing.
> 
> http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Lr7N6pbF07A/VJDEFMW_3LI/AAAAAAAAgH4/-uRLOAWIQnQ/s1600/rose%2Bdifference.jpg
> 
> How could you NOT like that?!

IT LOOKS SO GOOD! OP is cray
Meh. The old icons haven't aged so well and Teemo's more of an annoyance so I don't mind voting "no".
Screw rose, keep the pyramid icon and the nymph icon.
